name: Gangster Car Escape
description:
You're a street racer. For you, there are no rules for driving. You rush at high speed around the city. But not everything is so simple! In the city you expect the guards of order. And if they grab you, you'll have to answer before the law in all severity!

Amazing features of the game:
- Cut scenes in super HD quality.
- High definition animation.
- High Definition (HD) Display.
- Realistic HD graphics.
- Highly simulated physics engine.
